body: Well, it's really sad that I can't read japanese, but at least by translating first page of Bangetsu Setsuka's work on 21 (dang, drawing all these marks in google translate is sure tiring), I was able to know that main character's named Angel Lulu and is going on her first mission. This one is definitely my favourite
I've confirmed that the curse doesn't work, we're safe...

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curse
